abstract: The president’s legal team must maintain his support in the Senate while arguing his case to a broader jury: voters watching at home.
lead_paragraph: President Trump has expanded his legal team in hopes of securing a quick acquittal in his Senate impeachment trial. The lawyers he has enlisted include frequent guests on Fox News and former independent counsels who investigated President Bill Clinton. Together, they must maintain Mr. Trump’s support in the Senate while arguing his case to a broader jury: voters watching at home.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
